trans-unit.source: Comprehensive framework rules and guidelines for TSEF. Learn about agent guidelines, application structure, domain organization, testing strategies, security practices, and development principles.
TSEF rules, framework guidelines, development standards, coding practices, testing guidelines, security rules, domain architecture, application structure, best practices
Comprehensive standards and best practices that ensure consistency, reliability, and maintainability across all development activities in your enterprise application.

TSEF comes with comprehensive rules and guidelines that ensure consistency, reliability, and maintainability across all development activities. These rules are automatically enforced and guide every aspect of your enterprise application development.
The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119.
These rules are automatically enforced by the framework tooling and guide every aspect of your enterprise application development.
Your daily toolbox for fast feedback and reproducible results. Leverage Nxâ€™s smart task execution to visualize dependencies, run only what changed, and scale confidently across projects.
Visualize dependencies across apps and libraries.
Run tasks only where changes matter.
Execute a target across multiple projects.
TSEF is the AI-ready TypeScript Enterprise Framework. Easily build, deploy, and scale modern enterprise applications with best practices, advanced tooling, and AI capabilities out of the box.
TSEF, TypeScript, Enterprise Framework, AI-ready, Angular, web development, scalable, application framework, cloud, modern apps, enterprise solutions, software tools, best practices
The fastest way to an AI-ready Nx workspace
Enterprise-grade TypeScript stack with smart Nx workflows, agent-powered tooling, and built-in compliance.
Create your first TSEF workspace in under 2 minutes.
Update your TSEF workspace to the latest version.
Ready to go deeper? Explore the documentation, join the community, or reach out for support.
Read guides, patterns, and reference materials.
Get help, share ideas, and stay up to date.
Need help with onboarding or migration?
The installer scripts set up most tooling automatically. For a smooth onboarding and consistent builds, ensure these fundamentals are available on your machine before you start.
Install the latest LTS release for best stability.
For containerized local development and CI.
Learn how your workspace is organized so new code lands in the right place every time. Keep applications lean and reusable logic inside libraries for a maintainable monorepo.
Domain libraries: feature, data-access, ui, util.

While other tools provide basic monorepo functionality, TSEF delivers enterprise-grade capabilities that go far beyond standard development workflows. See how TSEF compares to traditional solutions and why it's the clear choice for organizations that demand quality, compliance, and scalability.
Already using Nx? TSEF extends Nx seamlessly. Add TSEF generators to your existing workspace without breaking changes.
Is this just Nx with extra steps?
TSEF extends Nx with enterprise governance, AI agents, and compliance automation that would take months to build yourself. It's Nx plus everything enterprises need for production-ready applications.
What if we already use Nx?
TSEF is built on Nx. You can adopt incrementally by adding TSEF generators to your existing workspace. No breaking changes, just enhanced capabilities.
TSEF is open source and free. No licensing fees, no vendor lock-in. You own your code and can customize everything to your needs.
TSEF generates standard Angular, NestJS, Ionic, and Keycloak code. You own your code and can eject anytime. No proprietary formats or dependencies.
Yes. All 200+ rules are configurable. Start with defaults, customize as needed. You can add your own rules or disable ones that don't fit your organization.

Ready to transform your enterprise development workflow? Get started with TSEF in minutes, not months. Our streamlined onboarding process and comprehensive documentation ensure you're productive from day one, with enterprise-grade applications running in your environment within hours.
Create your first TSEF workspace in under 2 minutes.
Learn more about installing, updating and using TSEF in the getting started guide.
Enterprise-grade Nx workflow with AI-powered development agents and built-in compliance.
AI-powered agents for automated development workflows
8 generators for Angular, NestJS, Ionic, Keycloak
While Nx provides monorepo tooling, TSEF adds enterprise governance, AI-powered workflows, and built-in compliance for production-ready applications.

TSEF transforms enterprise development through a streamlined three-step process that eliminates complexity while ensuring enterprise-grade quality. From intelligent code generation to automated deployment, every step is guided by AI agents and enforced by 200+ enterprise rules.
Run a generator (frontend, backend, native, keycloak-theme)

TSEF delivers measurable outcomes backed by concrete metrics and enterprise-grade capabilities. Every number represents real value delivered to development teams, from automated code generation to enforced quality standards.
TSEF is built by developers, for developers. Contribute, customize, and own your code.
Powered by the industry's favorite technologies

TSEF provides a comprehensive enterprise development platform that combines AI-powered automation with proven frameworks and governance. Every feature is designed to accelerate development while maintaining the highest standards of quality, security, and compliance.

TSEF delivers measurable value across every level of your organization. From developers writing their first line of code to CTOs making strategic technology decisions, everyone benefits from standardized, enterprise-grade development practices that accelerate delivery while reducing risk and technical debt.
Ship features faster with AI-powered workflows
Focus on business logic, not boilerplate
Reduce onboarding time from weeks to days

Enterprise development teams face mounting pressure to deliver secure, compliant, and scalable applications at unprecedented speed. Traditional approaches lead to inconsistent quality, slow onboarding, and compliance nightmares that cost millions in technical debt and missed opportunities.
AI agents guide development, 8 generators, zero-config patterns
Built-in compliance, automated monitoring, enterprise governance rules
Transform your development workflow with AI-powered automation
Streamline your entire development lifecycle from research to ship with intelligent Cursor commands. Built on proven Nx monorepo architecture for enterprise-grade reliability.
TSEF's streamlined workflow enhances quality and consistency. Start with research to explore possibilities, use planning to map strategy, implement with precision, and ship with confidence.

Explore topics deeply through multiple sources and perspectives. Synthesize findings, evaluate different approaches, and uncover potential risks and constraints. Save everything in a research file within .research/ with clear citations and actionable recommendations that guide the planning process.

Transform research into a clear roadmap by reviewing documentation and synthesizing findings. Break down features into manageable, actionable tasks and identify the right locations within the domain structure. Leverage Nx generators to streamline setup, then document everything in .plans/ with well-defined acceptance criteria.

Bring plans to life by building features that align with established conventions and naming standards. Work on dedicated feature branches, commit changes with clear, focused messages, and keep documentation up to date. Prioritize quality by writing thorough tests and running the full validation suite before finalizing work.

Share work by opening pull requests with descriptive titles and filling out PR templates completely. Engage code owners and stakeholders for review, respond thoughtfully to feedback, and ensure all checks pass successfully before merging changes.
